I have Cactus tests (essentially JUnit tests with datasource
connectivity, among other features that are irrelevant to this question)
that test my DAOs.

The tests ran fine in WSAD 5.0.  You'd start the server, run the class
as a JUnit Test, and it worked.  And if you didn't have the server
running and you tried to run a test class, you'd get a ConnectException:
Connection Refused.  Just what you'd expect.

When I run them in WSAD 5.1.2, using the same series of steps (start
server, run test), I get the ConnectException regardless.

Has anyone dealt with this successfully?
